Po

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Danish speaking Content Moderator, Lisbon, Portugal
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
David Kennedy Recruitment, Bangor, UK (Northern Ireland), is working with a leading Tech Consultancy who is seeking to onboard Danish speaking Content Moderator for their Lisbon offices. 

Position: Content Moderator 

Location: Lisbon Portugal

Employment type: Full-time

Remuneration: Base salary.

DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES:

  • Evaluate the comments posted on the website and in line with the client’s policies
  • Review text based comments and related user profiles
  • Moderate and escalate violations of client’s policies, using internal tools
  • Objective and high quality delivery/review for each case considered
  • Meet the weekly targets set (KPIs)
  • Prioritize the daily tasks in line with client’s requirements
  • Ad-hoc duties, as required (i.e. support different workflows/products/markets, etc.).

REQUIREMENTS:

  • Very good level of Danish, both oral and written
  • Upper-intermediate level of English (B2), at least
  • Already located in Lisbon (relocation not supported)
  • Computer literate with the ability to adopt new knowledge quickly
  • Experience in navigating various internet websites including social media
  • Up-to-date knowledge of current national and international news
  • Comfortable with reviewing internet content that may be deemed inappropriate and/or contain explicit material without bias
  • Customer oriented with focus on delivery
  • Analytical and highly detail oriented
  • Ability to work in a fast-paced environment with high volumes and changing demands
  • Stress-resilient and optimistic personality
  • Professional with strong work ethic and
  • Ability to work independently, with minimal supervision, and as a part of the team.

BENEFITS:

  • Excellent remuneration package based on experience, skills and performance
  • Be part of a dynamic multilingual, multicultural and creative team with positive and friendly atmosphere
  • Health and Life insurance
  • Meal allowance
  • Guidance and tools to reach your full potential.

More information:

David Kennedy, david@davidkennedyrecruitment.com

How to apply?

read the vacancy and apply online:

https://davidkennedyrecruitment.teamtailor.com/jobs/1485109-content-moderator-danish
